messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1832
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/11/2006 5:27:21 P.M. Eastern Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: There  have been more new members recently than usual.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/11/2006 5:27:21 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

There have been more new members recently than usual. Was the
address published somewhere or something? Just wondering...


Hi
We have been lurking and de-schooling for a year. Now we are un schooling in
earnest. I am at least:). My son is 13 and at an interesting stage in that he
seems to be a non-violent young man in a vast band of swagger. I found this
link on another site and it seemed to fit us:). There is a revolution afoot
in education. Thanks for being on the front lines.
Tangela (NC)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
